body_html: @prigoyal This is waaaay late to the game, but one thing to note: don't forget to put the explanatory text you write in a PR also inside the commit message (this commit ended up with just "Memory management for dlpack"); it makes the change description a lot more discoverable (otherwise, you have to look up the PR).

body: @prigoyal This is waaaay late to the game, but one thing to note: don't forget to put the explanatory text you write in a PR also inside the commit message (this commit ended up with just "Memory management for dlpack"); it makes the change description a lot more discoverable (otherwise, you have to look up the PR).
